item.title: Description changes
item.description: https://getjsonip.com - — Returns the Public IP address of the client it is requested from. No registration required for free tier. Using CORS data can be requested using client side JS directly from browser. Useful for services monitoring change in client and server IPs. Unlimited Requests.

item.title: Add GitGud & JSON IP
item.description:
https://gitgud.io - Unlimited private and public repositories. Free forever. Powered by GitLab & Sapphire. CI/CD not provided.
https://getjsonip.com - — Returns the Public IP address of the client it is requested from. No registration required for free tier. Using CORS data can be requested using client side JS directly from browser. Useful for services monitoring change in client and server IPs.

item.title: Add encore.dev
item.description: https://encore.dev/ - Backend framework using static analysis to provide automatic infrastructure, boilerplate free code, and more. Includes free cloud hosting for hobby projects.

item.title: Added and Fixed content.
item.description:
https://products.office.com/microsoft-teams/free - — Microsoft Teams is a chat-based digital hub that brings conversations, content, and apps together in one place all from a single experience. Free for up to 500k users.
https://esper.io - MDM and MAM for Android Devices with DevOps. 100 devices free with 1 user license and 25 MB Application Storage.
https://openode.io - Free Node.js hosting for Open Source projects. 100 GB Bandwidth/month with 100 MB memory & 1000 MB storage. Deploy using CLI or existing Git repository.
https://github.com/tvvocold/FOSS-for-Dev - FOSS for Dev](https://github.com/tvvocold/FOSS-for-Dev) — A hub of free and Open Source software for developers.
https://developers.redhat.com - Developers](https://developers.redhat.com) — Free access to Red Hat products including RHEL,OpenShift,CodeReady etc exclusively for developers. Individual plan only. Free e-Books also offered for reference.

item.title: Discord description changes
item.description: https://discordapp.com/ - Chat with public/private rooms. Markdown text, voice, video, and screen sharing capabilities. Free for unlimited users.

item.title: Added & Updated content .
item.description:
https://products.office.com/microsoft-teams/free - — Microsoft Teams is a chat-based digital hub that brings conversations, content, and apps together in one place all from a single experience. Free for up to 50k users.
https://drv.tw - Web](https://drv.tw) — Host directly to the web from Google Drive & OneDrive. Static sites only. Free forever. One site per Google/Microsoft account.

item.title: Add 20i
item.description:
https://www.20i.com/ - Free global CDN with no restrictions and 1 Tbps+ DDoS protection available on all web hosting, including free hosting.
https://www.20i.com/ - Free web hosting with no ads, on the same platform as paid plans. Includes a free CDN, 100 email addresses, SSL and over 80 one-click installs.
https://updrafts.app - WYSIWYG web site builder for tailwindcss based designs. Free for non-commercial usage.

item.title: Updated description for Authy
item.description: https://authy.com) - Two-factor authentication (2FA - Two-factor authentication (2FA) on multiple devices, with backups. Drop-in replacement for Google Authenticator. Free for up to 100 successful authentications.

item.title: Added "Authy" 2FA to list.
item.description: https://authy.com) - Two-factor authentication (2FA - Two-factor authentication (2FA) on multiple devices, with backups. Drop-in replacement for Google Authenticator.

item.title: Add CloudMailin.com
item.description: https://www.cloudmailin.com/ - Incoming email via HTTP POST and transactional outbound - 10,000 free emails/month
